Name: Via Roma
Ingredients: 20 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This aperitivo cocktail will appeal to lovers of Italian amari.
History: Created in 2017 by Mattia Conti at London Cocktail Club, Shoreditch, London, England. Originally named Bartender's Elixir.
Nutrition: One serving of Via Roma contains 157 calories
